_metadata.title: Records Management - Disposition Review Labels
_metadata.description: Creates retention labels with disposition review at the end of the retention period. Instead of automatic deletion, content is routed to designated reviewers who decide whether to permanently delete, extend retention, or apply a different label. Ensures human oversight for content disposal decisions.

prerequisites: Connect to Security & Compliance PowerShell: Connect-IPPSSession
Records Management feature must be enabled in the compliance portal
Microsoft 365 E5 Compliance or Records Management add-on required for disposition review
Disposition reviewers must have appropriate compliance portal access
Mailbox for reviewers (compliance-review@yourdomain.com) must be valid and monitored
Define disposition review workflow with records management team

dispositionProcess.triggerEvent: Retention period expires for content with this label
dispositionProcess.reviewerNotification: Disposition reviewers receive email notification when items are pending review
dispositionProcess.auditTrail: All disposition decisions are logged in the unified audit log for compliance evidence

deploymentSteps: 2. Create retention labels with disposition review enabled
3. Publish labels via a retention label policy
4. Configure disposition reviewer mailbox and permissions
5. Test disposition workflow with sample content
6. Monitor pending dispositions in compliance.microsoft.com > Records management > Disposition
_notes.rollbackProcedure: Remove-ComplianceTag -Identity '<LabelName>'. Pending disposition items will need to be resolved before label removal. Items already in disposition review will remain pending until a decision is made.

parameters.Name: Contract - 5yr Disposition Review
parameters.Comment: 5-year retention for contracts with mandatory disposition review before deletion. Reviewers must approve disposal or extend retention.

parameters.Name: HR Records - 7yr Disposition Review
parameters.Comment: 7-year retention for HR employee records with mandatory disposition review. Covers employment records, performance reviews, and personnel files.

parameters.Name: Project Records - 3yr Disposition Review
parameters.Comment: 3-year retention for project documentation with disposition review. Reviewers assess ongoing business value before disposal.

parameters.Name: PV26-DispositionReview-PublishPolicy
parameters.Comment: Publishes disposition review retention labels to all users. Labels trigger human review before content is permanently deleted at end of retention period.

verifyDispositionLabels.expectedResult: Labels with ReviewerEmail configured and disposition review enabled

checkPendingDispositions.expectedResult: Shows compliance tag storage status and any pending dispositions
